meanings.definition: A broadcast of an event over the internet.
meanings.sent1: I watched the webcast of the concert online.
meanings.sent2: The company organized a webcast of their product launch.
meanings.sent3: The webcast of the cat fashion show was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the webcast like a joyful melody.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors in the webcast made it feel like I was there in person.

meanings.definition: To broadcast an event over the internet.
meanings.sent1: They will webcast the conference for those unable to attend.
meanings.sent2: We need to webcast the meeting to reach a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally webcasted my cat's nap to all my contacts.
meanings.sent4: Her words webcasted a message of hope to everyone listening.
meanings.sent5: The webcasted image was crystal clear, as if the presenter was in the room with us.
